languages.text: If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 penalty to Willpower and Fellowship for each stack of this effect. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.
languages.original_text: Если при применении Устранения цель погибает, все противники ассасина в радиусе 3 клеток от нее получают по 2 уровня {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} и проходят проверку Ловкости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала они получают эффект {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} на 1 раунд. Тревожность: каждый уровень эффекта накладывает штраф −10 к Воле и Общительности. Ошеломление: ошеломленный персонаж получает штраф −20 к Ближнему Бою, Дальнему Бою, Силе, Выносливости и Ловкости.

traits.locale_text: If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain 2 stacks of the disturbed effect and must make an Agility test or become staggered for 1 round. Disturbed: A disturbed character suffers a -10 penalty to Willpower and Fellowship tests for each stack of this effect. To remove the disturbed effect, a character must rest aboard the voidship for at least 24 standard hours. Staggered: A staggered character suffers a -20 penalty to WS, BS, STR, TGH, and AGI tests.

If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the disturbed effect and must make an Agility test or become staggered for 1 round. Disturbed: A disturbed character suffers a -10 penalty to Willpower and Fellowship tests for each stack of this effect. To remove the disturbed effect, a character must rest aboard the voidship for at least 24 standard hours. Staggered: A staggered character suffers a -20 penalty to WS, BS, STR, TGH, and AGI tests.

If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 penalty to Willpower and Fellowship for each stack of this effect. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.

If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 penalty to Willpower and Fellowship for each stack of this effect. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.

languages.text: Если при применении Устранения цель погибает, все противники ассасина в радиусе 3 клеток от нее получают по 2 уровня {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} и проходят проверку Ловкости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала они получают эффект {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} на 1 раунд. Тревожность: каждый уровень эффекта накладывает штраф −10 к Воле и Общительности. Ошеломление: ошеломленный персонаж получает штраф −20 к Ближнему Бою, Дальнему Бою, Силе, Выносливости и Ловкости.
languages.original_text: If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 penalty to Willpower and Fellowship for each stack of this effect. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.

traits.locale_text: Если при применении Устранения цель погибает, все противники ассасина в радиусе 3 клеток от нее получают по 2 уровня эффекта "тревожность" и проходят проверку Ловкости. В случае провала они получают эффект "ошеломление" на 1 раунд. Тревожность: каждый уровень эффекта накладывает штраф −10 при прохождении проверок Воли и Общительности. Чтобы избавиться от тревожности, персонаж должен отдыхать на пустотном корабле не менее 24 часов. Ошеломление: ошеломленный персонаж получает штраф −20 при прохождении проверок Ближнего Боя, Дальнего Боя, Силы, Выносливости и Ловкости.

Если при применении Устранения цель погибает, все противники ассасина в радиусе 3 клеток от нее получают по 2 уровня эффекта "тревожность" и проходят проверку Ловкости. В случае провала они получают эффект "ошеломление" на 1 раунд. Тревожность: каждый уровень эффекта накладывает штраф −10 при прохождении проверок Воли и Общительности. Чтобы избавиться от тревожности, персонаж должен отдыхать на пустотном корабле не менее 24 часов. Ошеломление: ошеломленный персонаж получает штраф −20 при прохождении проверок Ближнего Боя, Дальнего Боя, Силы, Выносливости и Ловкости.

languages.text: 如果生机断绝击杀了目标，目标周围3格内的所有敌人都会获得2层{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}效果，受到影响的敌人必须进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}检定{/g}。若检定失败，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 惊扰：每层惊扰效果都会使该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}受到-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 恐慌：恐慌的角色会在{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}，以及敏捷检定中受到-20减值。
languages.original_text: If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for each stack of this effect. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and Agility.

traits.locale_text: 如果生机断绝击杀了目标，目标周围3格内的所有敌人都会获得2层惊扰效果，受到影响的敌人必须进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若检定失败，则会陷入恐慌状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 惊扰：每层惊扰效果都会使该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}受到-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。角色必须在虚空舰上休息至少24个标准时，才能消除惊扰效果。 恐慌：恐慌的角色会在{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}，以及敏捷检定中受到-20减值。

languages.text: Si el ataque de Liquidar mata al objetivo, todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 3 casillas en torno al objetivo ganan +2 acumulaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} y deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} para no quedar {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrados{/g} durante 1 asalto. Perturbado: Un personaje perturbado sufre una penalización de −10 a las pruebas de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} por cada acumulación de este efecto. Desequilibrado: inflige una penalización de −20 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y la Agilidad.
languages.original_text: If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 penalty to Willpower and Fellowship for each stack of this effect. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.

traits.locale_text: Si el ataque de Liquidar mata al objetivo, todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 3 casillas en torno al objetivo ganan +2 acumulaciones del efecto perturbado y deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} para no quedar desequilibrados durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Perturbado: Un personaje perturbado sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a las pruebas de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} por cada acumulación de este efecto. Para eliminar el efecto perturbado, un personaje debe descansar a bordo de la nave del vacío durante al menos 24 horas estándar. Desequilibrado: Un personaje desequilibrado sufre una penalización de −20 a las pruebas de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} y AGI.

languages.text: Wenn der Angriff Entledigung das Ziel tötet, erhalten alle Feinde im Umkreis von 3 Feldern um das Ziel +2 Stapel des Effekts {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g} und müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} schaffen, oder sie {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumeln{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang. Verstört: Ein verstörter Charakter erleidet pro Stapel dieses Effekts einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}. Taumelnd: Ein taumelnder Charakter erleidet einen Abzug von −20 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und Beweglichkeit.
languages.original_text: If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 penalty to Willpower and Fellowship for each stack of this effect. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Angriff Entledigung das Ziel tötet, erhalten alle Gegner im Umkreis von 3 Feldern um das Ziel +2 Mal den aufaddierbaren Effekt Verstört und müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} schaffen, oder sie taumeln für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. Verstört: Ein verstörter Charakter erleidet pro aufaddiertem Effekt einen −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Malus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefährten-{/g}Proben. Um den Effekt Verstört zu entfernen, muss sich ein Charakter mindestens 24 Standardstunden an Bord des Raumschiffs ausruhen. Taumelnd: Ein taumelnder Charakter erleidet einen Malus von −20 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH-{/g} und BEW-Proben.

languages.text: Si l'attaque Élimination tue la cible, tous les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de celle-ci subissent +2 cumuls de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} et doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'Agilité, faute de quoi ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 round. Perturbation : lorsqu'un personnage est victime de l'effet Perturbation, une pénalité de −10 s'applique aux tests de Volonté et de Sociabilité à chaque cumul de cet effet. Sidération : lorsqu'un personnage est victime de l'effet Sidération, une pénalité de −20 s'applique aux tests suivants : Compétence d'arme, Compétence balistique, Force, Endurance et Agilité.
languages.original_text: If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} and must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 penalty to Willpower and Fellowship for each stack of this effect. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.

traits.locale_text: Si l'attaque Élimination tue la cible, tous les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de celle-ci bénéficient de +2 cumuls de l'effet Perturbation et doivent effectuer un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Agilité{/g}, ou subissent l'effet Sidération pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Perturbation : lorsqu'un personnage est victime de l'effet Perturbation, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -10 s'applique aux tests de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g} à chaque cumul de cet effet. Pour dissiper l'effet Perturbation, le personnage doit se reposer à bord du vaisseau spatial pendant au moins 24 heures standard. Sidération : lorsqu'un personnage est victime de l'effet Sidération, une pénalité de -20 s'applique aux tests suivants : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}CA{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} et AGI.

languages.text: 処刑による攻撃でターゲットを撃破した場合、ターゲットの周囲3セル内のすべての敵は、+2スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}効果を得て、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。判定に失敗した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ状態{/g}となる。 動揺：動揺状態となったキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、この効果1スタックごとに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}判定を行う。動揺状態を解除するには、そのキャラクターをヴォイドシップで24時間以上{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}休ませなければならない{/g}。 よろけ：よろけ状態のキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}WS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}BS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}STR{/g}、TGHに-20のペナルティを受け、AGI判定を行う。
languages.original_text: If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for each stack of this effect. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and Agility.

traits.locale_text: 処刑による攻撃でターゲットを撃破した場合、ターゲットの周囲3セル内のすべての敵は、+2スタックの動揺効果を得て、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行わなければならない。判定に失敗した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、よろけ状態となる。 動揺：動揺状態となったキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、この効果1スタックごとに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}判定を行う。動揺状態を解除するには、そのキャラクターをヴォイドシップで24時間以上休ませなければならない。 よろけ：よろけ状態のキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}に-20のペナルティを受け、AGI判定を行う。
